Literature.Title: Structure-guided de novo design of alpha-helical antimicrobial peptide with enhanced specificity
Literature.Author: Huang JF, Xu YM, Hao DM, Huang YB, Liu Y, Chen Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µg/ml)
